com.iabhitech.empmgmt.gui

Class Theme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iabhitech.empmgmt.gui.Theme

  • public class Theme
extends java.lang.Object
    Theme class to hold the current theme color and provide easy way to switch between different color theme. The default supported theme: Dark Theme, Light Theme
